title: Support main looking for ADC for Diamond push (plat 4+)
body:
LF an ADC that can play most of the meta picks at a high level to climb to diamond with. I can play all supports well, just need someone that can carry the damage in a game.

Mostly available late at night (1:30am+ PST) and some times in the afternoon.

Add me in game or leave a post here with your current rank and top champions.

replies.body: Me bro test me IGN: Ryu1
